bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
/var/lib/hsqldb/lib/servlet.jar: broken symbolic link to servlet.jar
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
hsqldb-2.3.3-4.fc24.noarch
How reproducible: since recent update
Steps to Reproduce: 1.cd /var/lib/hsqldb/lib 2.ls -l servlet.jar lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 11 Feb 4 2016 servlet.jar -> servlet.jar 3.
Actual results:
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 11 Feb 4 2016 servlet.jar -> servlet.jar
Expected results:
Certainly not the above.
Additional info:
No systems should have broken symlinks - the packages that need them should create & remove them.
hsqldb-2.3.3-5.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-679d245f42
hsqldb-2.3.4-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-b4f529c237

hsqldb-2.3.3-5.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-679d245f42
